title: Red's Answer please (Referals)
body:
So basically i'm planning on making a smurf for the purposes of Drunk games (i will level it to ARAM level sober and then only play while drunk cause why not?)

Would i be allowed to Self Refer for this or would i be allowed to be "refered" by a friend in the creation of said smurf?

I figure why not have it be referred

replies.body:
Although Riot aren't against the existence of smurfs (probably because they can't be stuffed finding them all and banning them; it would be really hard to do anyway), they aren't exactly encouraging everyone to go and make some. Something like creating smurfs to get referrals probably breaks the EULA somewhere.

I'd be really cautious if I were you.
Yeah that's why i'm looking for a red answer before i do, and if i can't do it for myself, if i can do it for someone else instead.
True blue. You'll probably have better luck getting a red's attention on the Misc boards, though. Try posting this there.
